name: Ham Broth
description: This is a good recipe for after the holidays, when a ham bone is on hand. Try it in place of stock for a risotto or soup.
recipeIngredient: 1 onion, peeled, halved and then quartered

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients plus 4 quarts of water to a stockpot. Bring to a boil, then let simmer 2 hours. Skim fat from the surface, and add more water as needed. The less water in the stock, the more concentrated the flavor.
After 2 hours, strain bone and vegetables out of the stock. Use immediately or refrigerate or freeze stock.
